title: Background Research and Context Analysis
description: Research and document the background context of health challenges in South Africa, including current health disparities, government initiatives, demographic factors, and the role of data analytics in public health decision-making.

title: Business Objectives and Success Criteria Definition
description: Define clear business objectives focusing on health risk identification, healthcare access analysis, and hygiene-disease outcome relationships. Establish measurable success criteria and KPIs for project evaluation.

title: Inventory of Resources Assessment
description: Document and assess all available resources including datasets, tools, team expertise, time constraints, and technical infrastructure. Create comprehensive inventory for project planning.

title: Risks, Assumptions, and Constraints Analysis
description: Identify and document project assumptions about data quality and representativeness. Assess risks including missing data, sampling bias, and resource constraints. Define project limitations and mitigation strategies.

title: Data Mining Goals and Success Criteria
description: Define specific data mining objectives and analytical goals. Establish technical success criteria for data analysis, pattern identification, and model development phases of the CRISP-DM methodology.
deliverables: Data Mining Goals and Success Criteria

title: Comprehensive Data Description
description: Create detailed descriptions of all 12 HDPSA datasets including variable definitions, data types, value ranges, distributions, and structural characteristics. Document data sources and collection methodologies.

title: Data Exploration and Visualization
description: Conduct comprehensive exploratory data analysis across all datasets. Create visualizations showing distributions, relationships, and patterns. Generate interactive dashboard for stakeholder review using Power BI and web technologies.

title: Data Quality Assessment
description: Perform thorough data quality assessment including missing value analysis, outlier detection, consistency checks, and completeness evaluation. Document quality issues and recommend data preparation strategies.
